channel.title: Workflow on Jacob Miller
channel.description: Recent content in Workflow on Jacob Miller

item.title: Implementing a Dev Branch
item.description: I was recently asked to write up a proposal for a repository workflow. The result is in no way original but is a simplification of some of the branching strategies found in this article. Common GitHub Workflow Problems Many GitHub repositories have a simple workflow where contributors create feature branches directly off main and eventually merge back into it. This is a nice solution for small or proof-of-concept projects where stable production level code is not life or death.
